name: CryptoLuna
0:
”Alexa, ask Crypto Luna to add zero point one bitcoins”
”Alexa, ask Crypto Luna to list coins”
”Alexa, ask Crypto Luna my portfolio value”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: crypto luna
des:
Crypto Luna allows you to keep track of your crypto investments in a safe an anonymous way.
Provide updates to Crypto Luna anytime you purchase or sell crypto, and it will be able to tell the value of your portfolio at any time.

--

Some examples of user interactions:

 User > add zero point one bitcoin
 Alexa > I have added 0.10 bitcoin coins to your portfolio. What would you like to do ?

 User > remove five ethereum
 Alexa > I have removed 5 ethereum coins from your portfolio. What would you like to do ?

 User > portfolio value
 Alexa > Your portfolio is valued at 7318 US dollars. Down 58 US dollars in the last 24 hours. How can I help you ?

 User > list coins
 Alexa > You have 0.90 bitcoins valued at 6416 US dollars and 5 ethereums valued at 902 US dollars. What would you like to do ?

 User > empty portfolio
 Alexa > I have emptied your portfolio. How can I help you ?

--

Crypto Luna is able to tell you:

 The overall value of your portfolio.
 The amount of crypto coins and their value
 How much your portfolio value changed in the last 24h
 How much your portfolio value changed since last time you asked

It currently supports the following currencies: USD, EUR, CHF, INR

The following crypto currencies are supported:

 binancecoin
 bitcoin
 bitcoin-cash
 bitcoin-cash-sv
 cardano
 chainlink
 crypto-com-chain
 dash
 eos
 ethereum
 ethereum-classic
 huobi-token
 leocoin
 leo-token
 litecoin
 monero
 ripple
 stellar
 tether
 tezos
 tezos-iou
 tron
 usd-coin

For any questions/feedback: alexa.crypto.luna@gmail.com
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
